nodes.text: Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures

Star Wars Droids: The Kalarba Adventures was a Dark Horse comic book series that could be described as a story arc of the somewhat disjointed Star Wars Droids series. It consisted of six issues, published monthly from April to September 1994. The series was collected in trade paperback form in June 1995.
